# Hello this is test

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(visNetwork)
library(readr)

# Load data
nodes <- read_csv("data/nodes.csv")
edges <- read_csv("data/edges.csv")

# Create the interactive map
visNetwork(nodes, edges, width = "100%", height = "700px") %>%
  visNodes(shape = "dot", shadow = FALSE) %>%
  visOptions(highlightNearest = TRUE, nodesIdSelection = TRUE) %>%
  visHierarchicalLayout(direction = "LR", levelSeparation = 150) %>%
  visPhysics(stabilization = TRUE)
```
